subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Atlanta Braves continued to reward their young players, agreeing to a seven-year, $58 million contract with their Gold Glove-winning shortstop, Andrelton Simmons, 24.
snippet: The Atlanta Braves continued to reward their young players, agreeing to a seven-year, $58 million contract with their Gold Glove-winning shortstop, Andrelton Simmons, 24.
